column5: Hey Guys, just wondering if you could give me any info on fishin on Toronto Island? Or should I stick to the harbour front?  Any info would help,  Thanks guys
There are a few guys on the site that fish the islands. Great fishing from what i've been told. Give it a try and do a report after

Both should yield a few pike.  The best way is to start walking the shorelines looking for weed beds.   The Toronto harbour has many basins that hold pike as does the island.  Walking the basins from the ferry to spadina st. is a good start.   For the islands, start with taking the ferry to hanlen's or center and look for weed beds adjacent to deep water.  Spinnerbaits and jerkbaits should do the trick.   good luck!
I suppose you have now read Fishead Ric's thread, but if you haven't here it is: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=19166
